Giving
Thanks to generous alumni, parents, and friends, today’s Brown is making a difference in the world that only Brown can make.

Make a Gift














Giving
Thanks to generous alumni, parents, and friends, today’s Brown is making a difference in the world that only Brown can make.








Your support is helping Brown find solutions to global problems and improve lives.
We’ve increased access to education. Driven knowledge creation and research breakthroughs. Built a collaborative campus community. Your gift at any level makes it possible for the University to sustain academic excellence and build on its distinction. You and Brown: together.










  Give now.


  Support all that Brown makes possible.



MAKE A GIFT


















  Where to Give

















Brown Annual Fund





  As one of the University's most powerful giving vehicles, the Brown Annual Fund provides the immediate-use support that fuels the Brown experience.



Visit Page
















Open details for Brown Annual Fund



























Financial Aid





  When the best and brightest students decide where to enroll, we want them to choose Brown.



Visit Page
















Open details for Financial Aid



























Investing in Faculty





  Brown is building its capacity to lead in areas of great consequence to society through world-class teaching, research and innovation.



Visit Page
















Open details for Investing in Faculty



























Diversity & Inclusion





  Across the country, Brown’s work on diversity and inclusion is attracting attention.



Visit Page
















Open details for Diversity & Inclusion



























Athletics





  Through gifts to the Brown University Sports Foundation, we're supporting our scholar-athletes on and off the field.



Visit Page
















Open details for Athletics



























The Warren Alpert Medical School





  Brown’s medical faculty, staff, and students are invested in discovery, service to society, and the health of individuals and communities.



Visit Page
















Open details for The Warren Alpert Medical School



























School of Engineering





  Brown’s engineers are both deeply trained problem solvers and broadly trained problem seekers who grapple with complex issues that affect our daily lives. 



Visit Page
















Open details for School of Engineering



























School of Public Health





  Going beyond preventing disease to reshaping health care and safeguarding vulnerable populations, the school is improving human health on a large scale. 



Visit Page
















Open details for School of Public Health



























More Areas of Support





Across disciplines, departments, schools, and centers, your support has the power to propel education and research in every corner of College Hill. 


Visit Page
















Open details for More Areas of Support























  BrownTogether campaign


  Our ambitious goals are achievable when we unite to create our shared future: BrownTogether.



Learn more




















How to Give
You can make your gift to Brown in a variety of ways—from online to stocks to bequests.Find the method that best suits you.

  The Rise of Digital Health

 
  Emergency physician Dr. Megan Ranney MPH’10 RES’08 is using technology to help change patients' health care trajectory.










More giving stories



























Alumni & Friends

$25 million from Perelman Family Foundation to establish arts district at Brown

 April 18, 2023





  The Ronald O. Perelman Arts District will highlight the prominence of arts teaching, scholarship, and performance at Brown.


Read Article

















Open details for $25 million from Perelman Family Foundation to establish arts district at Brown

Exploring autism through stem cell technology

 April 15, 2023





  Assistant Professor Sofia B. Lizarraga and her lab are working to translate discoveries at the bench into therapeutic treatments for autism.


Read Article

















Open details for Exploring autism through stem cell technology


























Alumni & Friends

7 Brunonians who are paying it forward

 April 13, 2023





  From cooking meals for the homeless to advocating for Indigenous sovereignty to feeding the troops in Ukraine, Brown alumni share the ways they’re giving back to their communities.
